title: MT5 Account Deposit Request
description: This call allows deposit into MT5 account from Binary account.

from_binary.description: Binary account loginid to transfer money from

to_mt5.description: MT5 account login to deposit money to

amount.description: Amount to deposit (in the currency of from_binary)

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
